subject: Tennis
French Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: In what he said was his last career match in singles, Gustavo Kuerten fell 6-3, 6-4, 6-2 to Paul-Henri Mathieu at the French Open on Sunday.
snippet: In what he said was his last career match in singles, Gustavo Kuerten fell 6-3, 6-4, 6-2 to Paul-Henri Mathieu at the French Open on Sunday.
